extension_description.description: Description of the what the extension does.

command_toggle_description.description: Tooltip for toolbar button to turn Rikaichamp on or off

command_toggle_enabled.description: Tooltip for toolbar button when enabled.

command_toggle_disabled.description: Tooltip for toolbar button when disabled.

command_toggle_loading.description: Tooltip for toolbar button when loading.

command_toggle_checking.description: Tooltip for toolbar button when checking for updates.

command_toggle_downloading.description: Tooltip for toolbar button when downloading updates.

command_toggle_updating.description: Tooltip for toolbar button when applying updates.

command_toggle_update_error.description: Tooltip for toolbar button when we failed to update.

menu_enable_extension.description: Context menu item to enable the extension.

content_copy_keys_label.description: Label at start of row describing keys for copying information to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_entry_label.description: Label for key to copy a dictionary entry to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_fields_label.description: Label for key to copy a tab-separated set of fields to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_word_label.description: Label for key to copy a word to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_kanji_label.description: Label for key to copy a single kanji character to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_next_label.description: Label for key to move the copy highlight to the next entry

content_copied_entry.description: Overlay shown after copying an entry to the clipboard.

content_copied_fields.message: 已复制以制表符分隔的内容
content_copied_fields.description: Overlay shown after copying entry as a tab-delimited fields to the clipboard.

content_copied_word.description: Overlay shown after copying a word to the clipboard.

content_copy_error.description: Message shown in overlay when we couldn't copy to the clipboard

content_names_dictionary.description: The title used at the top of the popup when showing the names dictionary

content_kanji_radical_label.description: The title given to the box showing radical information

content_kanji_base_radical.description: The string used to describe the base radical

readings.example: しんにょう、しんにゅう

content_kanji_components_label.description: The label to give to kanji components when copying a kanji entry

content_kanji_grade_label.description: The label for kanji in grades 1 - 6

content_kanji_grade_general_use.description: Label for kanji marked as general use

content_kanji_grade_name_use.description: Label for kanji marked as name use

content_kanji_frequency_label.description: The prefix to the xxx / 2,500 frequency information

content_kanji_strokes_label.description: The description of the number of strokes

content_kanji_strokes_label_1.description: The description of the number of strokes when there is exactly 1 stroke

ref_label_radical.description: The label used when presenting radical numbers

ref_label_nelson_r.description: The label used when presenting Nelson's revised radical numbers. This should generally be a label that will sort directly after ref_label_radical when using String.localCompare.

ref_label_kk.description: The label used when presenting Kanji Kentei levels

ref_label_jlpt.description: The label used when presenting the level the kanji appears in in the old JLPT system

ref_label_py.description: The label used when present the Pinyin reading

ref_label_unicode.description: The label used when presenting the Unicode codepoint of the kanji

options_show_context_menu_item.message: 右键菜单中添加“启用 Rikaichamp”
options_show_context_menu_item.description: Option to enable context menu item with label `menu_enable_extension`

options_popup_style_heading.description: Heading for options to configure popup display

options_keyboard_heading.description: Heading for options to configure keyboard commands

options_hold_to_show_keys_description.description: Typically Rikaichamp shows the popup whenever it is active, but if these keys are configured the popup while only show while they are held down

options_hold_to_show_keys_explanation.message: 在这里选择按键，按住这些按键时划词，才会显示 Rikaichamp 窗口。如果不选择任何按键，只要在 Rikaichamp 已启用时划词，就会显示窗口。
options_hold_to_show_keys_explanation.description: This is supplementary explanation to options_hold_to_show_keys_explanation

options_popup_copy_fields.message: 复制以制表符分隔的内容

options_warning_language_is_kanji_only.message: 本设定目前只对汉字词典有效。

options_kanji_dictionary_heading.description: Heading for options to configure what information is displayed from the kanji dictionary

options_kanji_data_source_no_version.message: 本词典含有来自 KANJIDIC 的资料。
options_kanji_data_source_no_version.description: Attribution of kanji source data when no version is available. The keyword KANJIDIC must appear so that it can be link-ified to point to the corresponding home page.

options_kanji_data_source_with_version.message: 本词典含有来自 KANJIDIC 版本 $version$ 的资料，生成于 $generated$。
options_kanji_data_source_with_version.description: Attribution of kanji source data when version information is available. The keyword KANJIDIC must appear so that it can be link-ified to point to the corresponding home page.

options_kanji_license.message: 这些资料的所有权属于电子词典研究与开发小组（Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group），Rikaichamp 在 EDRDG 的许可协议的约束下使用它们。
options_kanji_license.description: Description of license terms. The keywords 'Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group' and options_kanji_license_keyword must appear so they can be linkified. IT SHOULD BEGIN WITH APPROPRIATE SPACE IN LANGUAGES THAT SEPARATE SENTENCES WITH WHITESPACE.

options_kanji_license_keyword.description: The keyword in options_kanji_license to link to the license

options_no_database.description: Label when the database has not yet been downloaded

options_last_database_check.description: Status to show when we last checked for an update

options_checking_for_updates.description: Label while we are checking for updates

options_kanji_data_name.description: The name for the kanji database data set

options_bushu_data_name.description: The name for the bushu database data set

options_downloading_data.description: Label while we are downloading updates

options_updating_data.description: Label while we are applying updates

options_db_update_error.description: Label when we failed to update the data for some reason

options_db_update_next_retry.description: Label used when there is a scheduled retry

options_offline_explanation.message: 无法检查更新，因为没有连接到互联网。一旦设备联网，Rikaichamp 会再次检查更新。
options_offline_explanation.description: Message shown when the system is offline so updates cannot be performed

options_update_check_button_label.description: Label for the button to check for database updates

options_update_retry_button_label.description: Label for the button to retry the database update after a failure

options_cancel_update_button_label.description: Label for the button to cancel a database update

options_kanji_components.description: Option to define if radicals are displayed or not

error_loading_dictionary.description: Tooltip shown when the dictionary fails to load

error_ctrl_alt_unsupported.message: 当前版本的 Firefox 不支持设置同时按下 Alt 和 Ctrl 的组合键
error_ctrl_alt_unsupported.description: Tooltip displayed when the user attempts to set a hotkey combination including both Ctrl and Alt in a version of Firefox prior to 63

error_ctrl_alt_warning.message: 较早版本（低于 63）的 Firefox 不支持设置同时按下 Alt 和 Ctrl 的组合键
error_ctrl_alt_warning.description: Tooltip displayed when the user attempts to set a hotkey combination including both Ctrl and Alt in a version of Firefox later than 63

error_command_is_missing_modifier_key.message: 必须使用一个修饰键，除非使用功能键（F1-F12）。

error_command_media_key_with_modifier_ke.message: 不能同时使用修饰键和多媒体按键

deinflect_polite_past_negative.message: 敬语 过去形 否定形
